title: Navigate forwards to a collapsed disclosure button in reading mode
task: navigate forwards to collapsed disclosure button
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the first disclosure button
instructions: Navigate to the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions. Note: it should be in the collapsed state.
assertion2: Name, 'What do I do if I have a permit for an assigned lot, but can't find a space there?', is conveyed
assertion3: State of the button (collapsed) is conveyed

title: Navigate from an expanded disclosure button to the text of a question answer in reading mode
task: navigate from expanded disclosure button to text of question answer
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on the first disclosure button, and sets its state to expanded
instructions: With the reading cursor on the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions, move into the text of the associated question answer. Note: you may need to press Down Arrow multiple times to hear the answer text in its entirety.
assertion1: Text of the answer is conveyed: 'Park at the nearest available parking meter without paying the meter and call 999-999-9999 to report the problem. We will note and approve your alternate location and will investigate the cause of the shortage in your assigned facility.'

title: Navigate from an expanded disclosure button to the text of a question answer
task: navigate from expanded disclosure button to text of question answer
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on the first disclosure button, and sets its state to expanded
instructions: With focus on the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions, move into the text of the associated question answer. Note: you may need to press Control+Option+Right multiple times to hear the answer text in its entirety.
assertion1: Text of the answer is conveyed: 'Park at the nearest available parking meter without paying the meter and call 999-999-9999 to report the problem. We will note and approve your alternate location and will investigate the cause of the shortage in your assigned facility.'
